description: Designed and developed interactives, charts, and newsroom tools. Contributed to data-driven investigations at the intersection of gun violence and criminal justice, public health, and campaign finance. Collaborated widely within the newsroom and in partnership with other media organizations. Received 2018 Deadline Club award.
Designed and built interactives, graphics, and feature articles. Developed digital newsroom strategy and achieved significant growth in online traffic. Trained and supervised digital intern.
Redesigned and maintained station website; improved livestreaming to grow online listenership. Recorded and edited radio content, including shows, ad spots, and interviews.
Conducted research and post-production work for a feature-length television documentary. Contributed editing to several other documentaries.
Developed lessons and materials to teach English to international groups of adults.
Directed and produced a series of documentary shorts about artists and material culture.
